item.title: Multi Dimensional Arrays in Java
item.description: Multi Dimensional arrays in Java can be termed as arrays of arrays. We can create two-dimensional, three-dimensional, four-dimensional or n-dimensional arrays in Java. Its quite simple to create arrays in Java, yet more the dimensions more the confusion. Let us see a quick tutorial. In this tutorial Iâ€™m going to take three-dimensional array as example.
